meanings.definition: The act of constructing or adding a cupola to a building.
meanings.sent1: The cupolaing of the old church was a challenging but rewarding project.
meanings.sent2: The cupolaing of the barn gave it a charming and traditional look.
meanings.sent3: The cupolaing of the school roof made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her cupolaing of the dollhouse with tiny details was like creating a miniature world.
meanings.sent5: The cupolaing of the gazebo with colorful tiles made it a focal point in the garden.

meanings.definition: The process of designing or planning a cupola.
meanings.sent1: The cupolaing of the new building involved careful measurements and sketches.
meanings.sent2: Architects spent weeks cupolaing the structure to ensure it matched the historical style.
meanings.sent3: The cupolaing of the treehouse was a fun project for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her cupolaing of the dream house included a unique spiral design.
meanings.sent5: The cupolaing of the birdhouse was inspired by a classic Victorian style.

meanings.definition: The action of decorating or painting a cupola.
meanings.sent1: The cupolaing of the lighthouse with bright stripes made it visible from afar.
meanings.sent2: Artists were busy cupolaing the dome with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The cupolaing of the garden shed added a touch of whimsy to the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her cupolaing of the ceiling with a mural transformed the room into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The cupolaing of the carousel with vibrant colors brought it to life.
